translations: v．重新印刷：指再次印刷已经印刷过的书籍、文章等。
· The book was so popular that it was reprinted several times.
这本书非常受欢迎，已经重印了好几次。

sentences.sentence: It remained an exceptionally rare book until it was reprinted in 1918.
sentences.translation: 在1918年再版之前，这本书一直非常罕见。

sentences.sentence: Danish newspapers reprinted the cartoons in February.
sentences.translation: 丹麦报纸今年2月再次刊登了这些漫画。

sentences.sentence: Reprinted with permission of The Rich Dad Company and Rich Press.
sentences.translation: 转载已经过富爸爸公司和财富出版社的许可。
